duties_responsibilities.duty: Strong understanding of Balance Sheet, P&L & Cashflow models.
Assist with forecasting and modeling for budgets.
Work with internal business leaders to ensure divisional reporting coordination.
Assist with tools to review all aspects of the business.
Develop financial reporting appropriate to analyze trends, margins, and opportunities.
Ability to work independently with cross-functional departments to obtain an understanding of key metrics that impact the business.
Understand key drivers of the Wholesale business; providing strategic insight and analysis to align with key business initiatives.
Ensuring that the use of business intelligence solutions being developed enhances business decision-making capabilities.
Assist with tools to review all aspects of the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance
